entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
